00019 void TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver::LoadInputs(EventQueue * Queue, Network * Net) throw (EDLUTFileException){
00020         unsigned short csize;
00021         
00022         this->Socket->receiveBuffer(&csize, sizeof(unsigned short));
00023         
00024         if (csize>0){
00025                 OutputSpike * InputSpikes = new OutputSpike [csize];
00026         
00027                 this->Socket->receiveBuffer(InputSpikes,sizeof(OutputSpike)*(int) csize);
00028                 
00029                 for (int c=0; c<csize; ++c){
00030                         InputSpike * NewSpike = new InputSpike(InputSpikes[c].Time, Net->GetNeuronAt(InputSpikes[c].Neuron));
00031                                                 
00032                         Queue->InsertEvent(NewSpike);                           
00033                 }
00034         }
00035 }

00056 void TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver::FlushBuffers() throw (EDLUTException){
00057         
00058         unsigned short size = (unsigned short)this->OutputBuffer.size();
00059         this->Socket->sendBuffer(&size,sizeof(unsigned short));
00060         if (size>0){
00061                 OutputSpike * Array = new OutputSpike [size];
00062                 
00063                 for (unsigned short int i=0; i<size; ++i){
00064                         Array[i] = this->OutputBuffer[i];       
00065                 }
00066                 
00067                 this->Socket->sendBuffer((char *) Array, sizeof(OutputSpike)*size);
00068                                         
00069                 delete [] Array;
00070                 
00071                 this->OutputBuffer.clear();
00072         }
00073 }
